sources.title: The Woman in the Window (1944)
sources.description: A seductive woman gets an innocent professor mixed up in murder. Watch on RetroFlix.org: https://retroflix.org/the-woman-in-the-window-1944/

sources.title: The Woman in the Window (1944)
sources.description: The Woman in the Window , directed by Fritz Lang, follows the story of Professor Richard Wanley , a psychology professor in New York City. One evening, Wanley stumbles upon a portrait of a mysterious woman in a gallery, which captivates him. After being enchanted by the portrait, Wanley finds himself drawn into a web of intrigue when he later sees the actual woman, Alice Reed , at a nearby apartment window. Wanleyâ€™s fascination leads him to an encounter with Alice, which quickly turns into an unexpected and perilous situation. When her boyfriend, Franklin , arrives and threatens them, a struggle ensues, resulting in Franklin's accidental death. In an attempt to cover up the incident, Wanley faces a moral and psychological crisis. The tension escalates as he navigates the consequences of his actions, leading him to paranoia and fear of being discovered.As the story unfolds, Wanley must deal with police investigation and the guilt of his actions while trying to protect himself from being implicated. The film concludes with a shocking twist, where the true nature of the characters is revealed, blurring the lines between victim and perpetrator.

sources.title: The Woman In The Window (1944) |Fritz Lang| Edward G. Robinson, Joan Bennett, Dan Duryea - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: The Woman in the Window is a 1944 American film noir directed by Fritz Lang and starring Edward G. Robinson, Joan Bennett, Raymond Massey, and Dan Duryea. It tells the story of psychology professor Richard Wanley (Edward G. Robinson) who meets and becomes enamored with a young femme fatale. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Woman_in_the_Window Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.

metadata.Plot: Gotham College professor Wanley and his friends become obsessed with the portrait of a woman in the window next to the men's club. Wanley happens to meet the woman while admiring her portrait, and ends up in her apartment for talk and a bit of champagne. Her boyfriend bursts in and misinterprets Wanley's presence, whereupon a scuffle ensues and the boyfriend gets killed. In order to protect his reputation, the professor agrees to dump the body and help cover up the killing, but becomes increasingly suspect as the police uncover more and more clues and a blackmailer begins leaning on the woman.
metadata.Actors: Edward G. Robinson, Joan Bennett, Raymond Massey
